Title: LRO LROC DEM, Alphonsus Crater, 4m Roughness
Abstract: 这是根据Alphonsus陨石坑的数字高程模型（DEM）LRO_NAC_DEM_13S358E_200cmp.tif得出的局部粗糙度图，立柱间距为2m，粗糙度基线（比例尺）为4m。像素值以米为单位，理论粗糙度不确定性等于源DEM的不确定性。另请参见相应的局部粗糙度和粗糙度危害颜色（专题）图。
Projection:
PROJCS['Equirectangular Moon',
	GEOGCS['GCS_Moon',
		DATUM['unknown',SPHEROID['unnamed',1737400,0]],
		PRIMEM['Greenwich',0],UNIT['degree',0.0174532925199433]],
	PROJECTION['Equirectangular'],
	PARAMETER['latitude_of_origin',-13],
	PARAMETER['central_meridian',0],
	PARAMETER['standard_parallel_1',0],
	PARAMETER['false_easting',0],
	PARAMETER['false_northing',0],UNIT['metre',1,AUTHORITY['EPSG','9001']]]
